Question & Options:
What events are connected to Miles and Kathy in the context of their relationship during the film?
Options:
A. Miles told Kathy to leave Bucky
B. Kathy went on a horrible date with Dick Shadow
C. Miles wanted to have his prize star to himself
D. All of the above

Which of the following statements are true regarding Gary and Bucky's interactions and Bucky's business venture?
Options:
A. Gary yelled at Bucky for owing him rent money
B. Bucky opened his own steakhouse
C. Gary compared Bucky to John Mayer
D. Gary is a successful restaurant owner
Correct Answer: Gary yelled at Bucky for owing him rent money, Bucky opened his own steakhouse, Gary compared Bucky to John Mayer
